an6.19:1.1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā nātike viharati giñjakāvasathe.
an6.19:1.6: “maraṇassati, bhikkhave, bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṁsā amatogadhā amatapariyosānā.
an6.19:2.1: Evaṁ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an6.19:2.3: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhāvesi maraṇassatin”ti?
an6.19:2.5: ‘aho vatāhaṁ rattindivaṁ jīveyyaṁ, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti.
an6.19:2.6: Evaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, bhāvemi maraṇassatin”ti.
an6.19:3.3: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhāvesi maraṇassatin”ti?
an6.19:3.5: ‘aho vatāhaṁ divasaṁ jīveyyaṁ, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti.
an6.19:3.6: Evaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, bhāvemi maraṇassatin”ti.
an6.19:4.3: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhāvesi maraṇassatin”ti?
an6.19:4.5: ‘aho vatāhaṁ tadantaraṁ jīveyyaṁ yadantaraṁ ekapiṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjāmi, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti.
an6.19:4.6: Evaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, bhāvemi maraṇassatin”ti.
an6.19:5.3: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhāvesi maraṇassatin”ti?
an6.19:5.5: ‘aho vatāhaṁ tadantaraṁ jīveyyaṁ yadantaraṁ cattāro pañca ālope saṅkhāditvā ajjhoharāmi, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti.
an6.19:5.6: Evaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, bhāvemi maraṇassatin”ti.
an6.19:6.3: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhāvesi maraṇassatin”ti?
an6.19:6.5: ‘aho vatāhaṁ tadantaraṁ jīveyyaṁ yadantaraṁ ekaṁ ālopaṁ saṅkhāditvā ajjhoharāmi, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti.
an6.19:6.6: Evaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, bhāvemi maraṇassatin”ti.
an6.19:7.3: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhāvesi maraṇassatin”ti?
an6.19:7.5: ‘aho vatāhaṁ tadantaraṁ jīveyyaṁ yadantaraṁ assasitvā vā passasāmi passasitvā vā assasāmi, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti.
an6.19:7.6: Evaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, bhāvemi maraṇassatin”ti.
an6.19:8.1: Evaṁ vutte, bhagavā te bhikkhū etadavoca:
an6.19:8.2: “yo cāyaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ maraṇassatiṁ bhāveti:
an6.19:8.3: ‘aho vatāhaṁ rattindivaṁ jīveyyaṁ, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti.
an6.19:9.1: Yo cāyaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ maraṇassatiṁ bhāveti:
an6.19:9.2: ‘aho vatāhaṁ divasaṁ jīveyyaṁ, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti.
an6.19:10.1: Yo cāyaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ maraṇassatiṁ bhāveti:
an6.19:10.2: ‘aho vatāhaṁ tadantaraṁ jīveyyaṁ yadantaraṁ ekapiṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjāmi, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti.
an6.19:11.1: Yo cāyaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ maraṇassatiṁ bhāveti:
an6.19:11.2: ‘aho vatāhaṁ tadantaraṁ jīveyyaṁ yadantaraṁ cattāro pañca ālope saṅkhāditvā ajjhoharāmi, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti.
an6.19:12.1: Ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, bhikkhū pamattā viharanti dandhaṁ maraṇassatiṁ bhāventi āsavānaṁ khayāya.
an6.19:13.1: Yo ca khvāyaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ maraṇassatiṁ bhāveti:
an6.19:13.2: ‘aho vatāhaṁ tadantaraṁ jīveyyaṁ yadantaraṁ ekaṁ ālopaṁ saṅkhāditvā ajjhoharāmi, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti.
an6.19:14.1: Yo cāyaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ maraṇassatiṁ bhāveti:
an6.19:14.2: ‘aho vatāhaṁ tadantaraṁ jīveyyaṁ yadantaraṁ assasitvā vā passasāmi passasitvā vā assasāmi, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti.
an6.19:15.1: Ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, bhikkhū appamattā viharanti tikkhaṁ maraṇassatiṁ bhāventi āsavānaṁ khayāya.
an6.19:16.2: ‘appamattā viharissāma, tikkhaṁ maraṇassatiṁ bhāvessāma āsavānaṁ khayāyā’ti.
